verses.name: Romans 3:1
verses.text: What advantage then hath the Jew? or what profit is there of circumcision?

verses.name: Romans 3:2
verses.text: Much every way: chiefly, because that unto them were committed the oracles of God.

verses.name: Romans 3:3
verses.text: For what if some did not believe? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect?

verses.name: Romans 3:4
verses.text: God forbid: yea, let God be true, but every man a liar; as it is written, That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings, and mightest overcome when thou art judged.

verses.name: Romans 3:5
verses.text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God, what shall we say? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance? (I speak as a man)
